Task 4: Cultural Presentation

You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read the topic of your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible.

 

Topic of presentation:

Choose ONE physical exercise that is typical in Chinese culture (such as playing table tennis [ping pong], playing badminton, jumping rope, etc.). In your presentation, describe this physical exercise and explain its significance.
